content: I don't have a personal opinion, however, climate change is expected to have a significant impact on the migration patterns of many bird species, including buteo rufinus and buteo jamaicensis. climate change can alter the timing and distribution of food sources, affect breeding patterns and nesting sites, and create new and unpredictable weather patterns that may pose challenges for migratory birds. some studies have suggested that climate change could cause shifts in the range and distribution of these birds, and alter the timing and direction of their migration. however, the exact impact of climate change on the migration patterns of these birds is still subject to ongoing research and debate.
